Interests

Apart from being a full stack developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in the United Kingdom, I enjoy long walk, mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the full stack web development world.
